name: group_t_test
description: Perform an independent two-sample t-test between two groups on a numeric column.

file_path.description: Path to the data file (.csv, .xlsx, .json, or .jsonl).

sheet_name.description: Sheet name or index (only for Excel files).

category_col.description: The name of the categorical column that defines the groups.

value_col.description: The name of the numeric column to compare between the groups.

group_names.description: Optional: Specify two group names to compare. If omitted, the function will attempt to auto-detect.
